price: Onlar səni gördükdə ancaq sənə lağ edib (belə deyirlər): “Budurmu Allahın elçi göndərdiyi kəs?
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡكَ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي بَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولًا

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awka in yattakhidhūnaka illā huzuwan ahādhā alladhī baʿatha al-lahu rasūlan
